name: Spirit Maze
description:
READ FIRST!!!!!

Your goal is to help those spirits that are stuck in the maze. Spirits are white glowing sphere.  FREE THEM BY TOUCHING THEM. **You get a different maze each time you play.

Each spirit has its own sound. It is the sound that the dead heard before he/she died. RIP.

Control
Move:  W, A, S, D
Run: L-shift

Made for Mini Jam 25. Spirit Theme. No Text.

Credit
A game by Tanadol  Deachprapakorn.
Sfx from freesound.org:
- Cry by Silversatyr
- Woman Scream by Sironboy
- Child Laughs by hoerspielwerkstatt-hef
- Crying Newborn Baby Child 3 by The Yura

08/04/19
